MktCalcInsightObjectDef.description: Number of generations at Prompt Template Level
MktCalcInsightObjectDef.expression: SELECT GenAIGatewayRequest__dlm.promptTemplateDevName__c AS prompt_template__c, COUNT(GenAIGatewayRequest__dlm.gatewayRequestId__c) AS generation_count__c FROM GenAIGatewayRequest__dlm WHERE GenAIGatewayRequest__dlm.promptTemplateDevName__c IS NOT NULL GROUP BY GenAIGatewayRequest__dlm.promptTemplateDevName__c
